main event: An unidentified object was sighted by a pilot from a B-26 aircraft near St. Louis, Missouri, which he attempted to circle but lost sight of after it flew west.
interesting points: The object appeared motionless at first and was at the same altitude as the observer's aircraft,The object was described as having four nacelles with no props, and a blue light emitting from the rear,The observer attempted to increase speed to catch up with the object and got within 2200 feet of it,Intense static was experienced on the radio when the bright light from the UFO was detected,The object was reported to be about the size of an E-29 aircraft and had two rows of three lights each on the bottom.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object resembling a conventional aircraft
witness description: pilot and co-pilot from the National Guard
